verbose_text: In conclusion, the J H -/- pig (1) can be immediately utilized as a pre-clinical model to study porcine and human diseases in the absence of B cells to aid vaccine development for agricultural and clinical applications, and (2) provides a starting point for generating pigs capable of producing fully human, antigen specific, pathogen-free polyclonal Abs for immunotherapy to prevent or treat numerous diseases and pathogens with unmet clinical need.
evidence: pigs capable of producing fully human, antigen
